Primary Contact: Mary-Em Waddington, Executive Director; Phone: ​604-250-9936; Email: ?mwaddington@reusetechbc.ca
Service Details: - Administers the 'Computers for School' program in the Province of BC - Responsible for the procurement of donated computers and related technology tools and subsequent refurbishment to ensure quality reused equipment for schools, non profit organizations, public libraries and First Nationals communities - Furthers education through reusable computer equipment and assists youth in first work experience - Helps to bridge the last of the digital divide, supporting education and learning
